name: FileeArranger
short_description:
When you see your folder messed up with the various kinds of file and you dont wanna do all arrangment manually well at this time File Arranger application comes at light. All you have to do is to  place file Arranger application to a folder where you want to arrange the files. And write the file extension on the textBox and click on Arrange button.file Arranger will create a folder of that extension and put all files with same extension.
If you are too lazy to write a name extension. you can directly click on Auto Arrange it will arrange all file inside the Arranged_folder named folder.
summary: This app will Arrange files on the basis of their file extension.
